channel.title: How to train magic?
channel.description: whats the quickest way of getting your magic up? mines 56 and i want it to get it to about 80. i heard high alching was good but i dont know what items i should alch that dont lose me money (make more than 250/cost of item). or what about enchanting jewellery? or maybe just plain old spells. so what do you reckon is the fastest way of getting up magic?

item.title: How to train magic?

item.description:
@sidishere wrote:

oh, sorry i forgot to mention im f2p and im probably gonna stay that way.

Read full topic

item.title: How to train magic?
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

People alch yew longs mostly, but if you alch magic longs then I think that you wonâ€™t lose anything because you get 1536gp per 1 magic long so if you buy the longs for 1,2k ea and nats for 280gp ea then you will make 56gp profit per bow.
